page.title: 13Beckingham(Lincs) _ Clubs 1
page.content: {"The Good Companions" {_____________________ The above was formed with a membership of approximately 30 when the Village Hall opened in 1972. The club includes people from a 3 mile radius, including Brant Broughton, Barnby and Coddington. These members have had connections with the village at one time or another and several of the older ones attended the old Beckingham School. Although members are mainly senior citizens single people of the younger age group are welcome together with widows and widowers. Meetings are held once a month with the main activities being whist, dominoes and the popular game of today, Bingo. Three outings are arranged in the summer months also a dinner in the New Year. Membership has remained at around 30/35.
